properties.entry: SELECT HR_ID , HR_PWD , HR_NAME , HR_PHONE , HR_EMAIL , B_CODE FROM HR WHERE HR_ID = ?
SELECT A.USER_PWD , A.USER_BLOCK FROM USER A WHERE A.USER_PHONE = ?
SELECT A.USER_CODE , A.USER_NAME , A.USER_PHONE , A.USER_PWD , A.USER_BDAY , A.USER_GENDER , A.USER_ADDRESS , A.USER_REGISTER_DATE , A.USER_BLOCK FROM USER A WHERE A.USER_PHONE = ?
